updateGuestByID(int) - Method in class com.ntu.scse.GuestMgr
Shows the menu for updating guest details.
updateMenuItem() - Method in class com.ntu.scse.RoomService
Update menu item with the given option to update 1) food name 2) food description 3) food price 4) update everything at once 5) return to main
updateOrderItem(String, BillMgr) - Method in class com.ntu.scse.RoomService

updateResvOption(RoomMgr) - Method in class com.ntu.scse.ReservationMgr
Shows the menu for updating reservation details.
updateRoom() - Method in class com.ntu.scse.RoomMgr
Options to update room 1) Room type allow client to change the room type 2) Room rate allow client to change the default room rate 3) Status allow client to change the current room status 4) Smoking/WIFI allow client to set whether room is allow for smoking/WIFI 5) Return to main
